name: WellChess_Offline
description:
A simple homework game derived from traditional Tic-Tac-Toe.Chesses were played hidden and then revealed in a 4x4 chessboard.

Failed in configrating with two players online so it's turned back to an offline version.

I'm just a common Chinese University student making games for fun.Happy to make friends with others.My email: guaguardw@163.com
